Scientically, ‘Knowledge’ lies along a continuum between ‘Information / Data’ and ‘Wisdom’.

Collectively, these inter-related hierarchical elements are termed the [[DIKW]] scientific learning pathway.
     
'''K'''nowledge, from a scientific perspective, is generally viewed as ‘the ability to predict response-patterns, based upon evidence collected by the [[scientific method’]]. All scientific knowledge is derived from scientific ‘Information’: Some experts define scientific ‘knowledge’ as ‘information in context’.
